sentences.en: A normal prostate is the size of a walnut, but the condition can increase this to the size of a tangerine.

sentences.en: An enlarged prostate does not necessarily mean cancer.
sentences.cn: 前列腺肿大不一定就是癌症。

sentences.en: Another way to prevent prostate disease is through diet.
sentences.cn: 预防前列腺疾病的另一种方法是饮食。

sentences.en: At higher magnification , the enlarged prostate has glandular hyperplasia.

sentences.en: By age 75, most men get preliminary prostate cancer.

sentences.en: Gonorrhea and other Bacterial infections involving the prostate are treated with antibiotics.

sentences.en: In patients with prostate cancer, PSA values fell , indicating reduction of tumor.

sentences.en: It is normal if the woman feels like she needs to urinate, as the prostate tissue surrounds the urethra, the tube through which urine leaves the bladder.

sentences.en: Louis: No need, I know already. An enlarged prostate.

sentences.en: Objective To improve the early diagnostic detection rate of the prostate carcinoma.
sentences.cn: 目的提高早期前列腺癌的检出率.

sentences.en: Prostate - specific antigen ( PSA ) is a well characterized human prostate specific glycoprotein.

sentences.en: Similar subgroup analyses yielded inconsistent results for prostate and colorectal cancer.
sentences.cn: 小组的同样分析,前列腺癌和结肠直肠癌的结果不一致.

sentences.en: Sweden's University Hospital urologist that chronic prostate pollen a very high efficacy.

sentences.en: The study was published in the journal The Prostate.
sentences.cn: 这一研究已在前列腺癌杂志发表.

sentences.en: The tumor in his prostate gland was caught at an early and very likely curable stage.
sentences.cn: 由于他的前列腺肿瘤是在早期被发现的,处在很有可能治愈阶段.
